*div1 type="summary"* *p*Frost Thorn to Austin, Nacogdoches, August 28, 1832. Describing futile efforts to induce Piedras to declare for Santa Anna. Tranquilizing, the Cherokee.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-28-1832">28 August 1832*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Dear Sir.*/p*
*p*Your letter of *date_mentioned n="08-12-1832">12th. inst*/date_mentioned*. was *date_mentioned n="08-27-1832">yesterday */date_mentioned*handed to me, it affords me as well as my *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*pleasure to see that yr views so completely agree with the course adopted in the late difficulty with *person_mentioned*Col Piedras*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Perhaps a greater Interest never was taken to accomidate matters than was taken in this case, day after day and time after time, the *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*village */location_mentioned*called on him for that object. I myself urged the case so strongly and so repeatedly that I was fearfull he would arrest me if I persisted.-—and as a stronger argument I showed him a letter I had received from *person_mentioned*Mr. S. M. Wms */person_mentioned*noting the arrivel of yourself and *person_mentioned*Coln. Mehir*/person_mentioned* and that 1000 *person_mentioned*colonists */person_mentioned*would assist *person_mentioned*Coln. M.*/person_mentioned* if needed etc. etc.—his replies I will not pretend to state to you, but they were all full of fight, and If in Justification to the cause, and to counteract any false representation that might be made, you should wish to be made acquainted with the efforts the *person_mentioned*Citisens */person_mentioned*used to prevent the effusion of Blood, a Note from you to the *person_mentioned*Alcalde of this district */person_mentioned*to take evidence, will be immediately attended to—and It will appear that there was the utmost courtesy on the one side and the most determined obstinacy on the other.—*person_mentioned*Coln. P.*/person_mentioned* complains of the unceremonious note of *person_mentioned*Coln Bullock */person_mentioned*to him*/p*
*p*It merely stated that at a meeting of the *person_mentioned*officers */person_mentioned*under his command, it was resolved to support the constitution and the plan of *person_mentioned*San Anna*/person_mentioned*, demanding of him to surrender to some *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned*friendly to that cause he (*person_mentioned*Bullock*/person_mentioned*) reserving to himself the priviledge of apptg. that *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned*and that *person_mentioned*Piedras */person_mentioned*should surrender as a *person_mentioned*prissoner of War.*/person_mentioned* pled[g]ing to him Protection. Suitable attentn etc. etc. Allowing him 4 Hours for an ans. the note was answered and you are acquainted with the result.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*doubtless were employed as *person_mentioned*auxeliaries */person_mentioned*and it required much explanation to counteract his influence over the *person_mentioned*cherikees*/person_mentioned*. but I am induced to believe that these feelings at this time are encirely changed, and that we have but little to fear from them.*/p*
*p*However I shall proceed *date_mentioned n="08-29-1832">tomorrow */date_mentioned*in company with *person_mentioned*Juan Durst */person_mentioned*to see *person_mentioned*Bowls */person_mentioned*when so much of yr letters to us, will be explained to them, as relates to them. This course we deem important, as a party of *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*are now assembling to attack the *person_mentioned*Kechise */person_mentioned*(in conse- quence of a murder it is supposed they committed on an *person_mentioned*american*/person_mentioned* near *location_mentioned*Tenoxtitlan*/location_mentioned*) In order to explain to *person_mentioned*Bowls */person_mentioned*that the Hostility (if the party proceeds) is only against that party of *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*and to entirely neutralise the *person_mentioned*cherekes */person_mentioned*etc. etc.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Coln Bullock*/person_mentioned* is taking an Inventory of the public property a copy of which will be forwarded to you. The *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*is now in a state of perfect tranquility—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*F. Thorn */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Coln S. F. Austin.*/person_mentioned* */p* */div1*
